title: What is Fizz?
body: He isn't a Yordle, nor he looks like a Vastaya... Do we even know what he is?

replies.body: A fish...
https://imgur.com/SsueOpt

I was going in this thread expecting exactly this answer to be at the top.
Thanks for not disappointing me, guys.
cancer
hes a fizz
He is the living incarnation of magical cancer with no cure in sight, with a single buff he could outclass the demonic midget named Teemo.
He's an offshoot yordle species that developed to live under the sea.
With the new yordle changes, that MAY be correct, but it's unlikely.
He might also tie into the Vaysta somehow.  Either is equally likely/unlikely

He most definately is a Vastaya.

Vaystaya doesn't just mean "Bird person".

It's a term that refers to any humanoid with animal features.

His species is likely closely related to that of Nami and Sea Hunter Aatrox, the Marai.

Sharjo(who works with the lore team) already confirmed that Fizz isn't a vastaya

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/uEZ2eLVs-minotours-are-vastayan-right?comment=0000000000000002000000000000


Also keep in mind that sea hunter aatrox is still part of an alternate universe.The marai might have the ability to grow legs in that universe,but that doesn't mean that this goes for the main universe as well(after all Nami had clearly no idea what legs are in her new lore,so it is unlikely that any marai is able to grow legs)
But since he isn't on the Vastaya's Universe Page, I believe he isn't one. Also since when is Sea Hunter Aatrox considered a Marai?
Sea Hunter Aatrox was confirmed to be what would happen if a Marai wielded Aatrox shortly after the skin was released on beta.
Didn't know that. :/ Do you have a source, just to be 100% sure? And does this confirms Aatrox being the sword?

They have talked about Darkin as sentient weapons in the past multiple times, it's pretty much been understood for a while now that the sword itself takes over the wielder and warps them toward the sword's base nature, AKA turns them into the Aatrox we know.

There is also talk that Varus's bow is infact a Darkin weapon, just that the Varus we see has only just begun to be consumed by the Darkin.   I heavily suspect that if Varus ever gets a VGU update of a similar size to Sion, Galio, or Yorick, he'll actively be hearing the Darkin and we'll hear it similar to how you can hear the Maiden of the Mist when playing Yorick as it tries to lure him further into the corruption.   May also just be a great idea for a legendary skin with an evolving model that advances as he further is consumed by the bow until fully giving in lategame.

Fizz is part of the same branch of the Vastaya genus as Nami is.


You have to understand just how broad the term Vastaya means.  Vastaya is as large a genetic familial branch as Mammals is, from the elephant to the whale to the rat to the platapus.   About the only thing needed to fall under the Vastaya flag is to have animalistic blood and be a magical creature.

No he isn't.
Sharjo(who works with the riot lore team) confirmed this already
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/uEZ2eLVs-minotours-are-vastayan-right?comment=0000000000000002000000000000

In general I remember that it was said that very champ who isn't listed on the vastaya page is not a vastaya.(Also nami has no idea what legs are,so its safe to say that no one in the marai tribe has legs)
http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_GB/race/vastaya/
Not even Riot knows. But maybe around 2020 once the game actually has lore we'll find out.

Fizz is a yordle, originally it was “he’s distantly related to yordles” but now with thelore overhaul for yordles, it’s confirmed he’s a yordle.   Yordles are easily affected by the environment and society they live in and adapt to suit, so much so they begin to embody that culture

In the lore it says Fizz is a yordle , there may be different types but in the end a yordle is a yorlde. It says it in the website also in the League mini bios they give when you go to the champions collection in the game. He is NOT a Vastaya ( Like Xayah or Rakan )  nor a Vastayashai're ( like Neeko ) {{champion:105}}
he's a yordle. All small characters are yordles, just like annie corki and amumu.

Annie is human... All yordles (within the excpetion of Amumu, since we don't know what he is exactly) are identified as Yordles in their Bios. Plus they have some common characteristics between them; Teemo, Tristana, Rumble, Kled, Poppy, Lulu, Heimer, Ziggs, Kennen all have fur, cat ears, eyes, nose and a tiny size. Veigar's a yordle too but its magic modified his appearance so much that he isn't really looking like a yordle now. Yordles are a race, not a description.
nah i think you are mistaken. Annie is obviously a yordle.
Are you trolling or what?
He is...
He's a Zora.

mage

A fish summoned from the depths of hell
a reverse merman... fish head human body
I thought they put him in vastayan..idk I don't read lore much, just what I watch from vandarill

Nope
They said that only the champs that are listed on the vastaya page are the only vastaya in the game.
Everyone else isn't a vastaya.
http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_GB/race/vastaya/
Well this seems weird to me since Vandiril never talked about Lore in his vids (if he did I don't rememenber at all...)
Cancer.
He's part of an underwater race that didn't have a name and is currently all but extinct based on current knowledge, so he as a species doesn't really NEED a name since currently it's only Fizz.
runeterras equivalent of an atlantean
He is a demon from hell
